named-query.name: User.findPermitions
named-query.query: SELECT distinct p.name FROM User u INNER JOIN u.groups g INNER JOIN g.permitions p WHERE u = :user

named-query.name: Bill.findMonthExpense
named-query.query: SELECT new br.com.casuaiscontas.dto.bill.BillDto( SUM(b.price), (SELECT SUM(price) FROM Bill WHERE user.id = :userId AND status = 'NOT_PAID' AND MONTH(createdAt) = MONTH(NOW())) ) FROM Bill b WHERE user.id = :userId AND status = 'PAID' AND MONTH(createdAt) = MONTH(NOW())

named-native-query.name: Bill.findMonthlyExpense
named-native-query.query: SELECT SUM(price) expense, date_format(created_at, '%m/%Y') MONTH FROM bill WHERE created_at > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH) AND status = 'PAID' AND id_user = :userId GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(created_at , "%m/%Y") ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(created_at , "%m/%Y") DESC LIMIT 6
